segments.text: Excuse me , please.Could you tell me how to get to the No . 10 Middle School ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Walk down this road , take the fourth turn to the right.Then you'll see it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it far from here to there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . It's only about five minutes ' walk .
segments.speaker: S2
